mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mount Vernon Mansion, east front
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Unknown
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white horizontal image of the Mansion's east front, taken from the northeast. A person can be seen sitting on the east lawn. The balustrade has been removed for repair. Handwriting on the reverse reads: 'Mt Vernon From album of (illegible name and address), 1862 - 1872. A portion of an orange, two cent stamp also appears on the reverse.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mansion exterior
